title: Hanging, "Earth", 1972–73
medium:
Medium: Wool, cotton
Technique: Twill fret derivation
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 91.4 x 49 cm (36 x 19 5/16 in.)
description: Interlocked twill fret pattern. Ivory warp and dark brown wool weft. Red cotton stripe in sides. 7 inch warp fringe at both ends.

exhibitions.title: The Cooper-Hewitt Collections: A Design Resource

tombstone.epitaph:

1972–73. Medium: Wool, cotton
Technique: Twill fret derivation. Gift of Friends of Textiles. 1974-75-2.
